1 // An extension of FieldView that generates SimCommands in response
2 // to clicks/drags when live.
3 
4 #pragma once
5

14 class SimFieldView : public FieldView {
15  Q_OBJECT;

18  SimFieldView(QWidget* parent);

27 
28  // Drag a ball based on screen coordinates.
29  void drag_ball(const QPoint& screen_pos);
30  // Drag a robot based on screen coordinates.
31  void drag_robot(const QPoint& screen_pos, int robot_id, bool is_blue);
32 
33 Q_SIGNALS:
34  // Emitted when the user selects a robot.
35  // The robot is identified by shell number.
36  // shell may be -1 to select no robot.
37  void robotSelected(int shell);
38

47  // True while a line is being dragged from the ball
48  enum { DRAG_NONE = 0, DRAG_PLACE, DRAG_SHOOT } drag_mode_ = DRAG_NONE;
49  int drag_robot_ = -1;
50  bool drag_robot_blue_ = false;
51 
52  rj_geometry::Point drag_point_;
53  rj_geometry::Point shot_;

55  rclcpp::Node* node_ = nullptr;
